summary: Analyzed current plan format, skill-team-implement phase parsing, and DAG best practices. Recommended Dependencies field notation: None | Phase {N} | Phase {N}, Phase {M}. Field is optional for backward compatibility. Integration needed in plan-format.md, artifact-formats.md, skill-team-implement, and planner-agent.

artifacts.summary: Research report with current format analysis, industry DAG notation patterns, and implementation recommendations
